long_description: The Seattle Sports Sherpak Boat Roller mounts to your car's top or windshield to assist in loading your kayak onto the roof of your car. Heavy-duty suction cups offer a reliable, secure mount; suction cups feature levers for easy engagement and release. Foam rollers on bar protect the boat. The Seattle Sports Sherpak Boat Roller is best used in conjunction with foam blocks or cradles (not included).
short_description: The Seattle Sports Sherpak Boat Roller mounts to your car's top or windshield to assist in loading your kayak onto the roof of your car.
